channel.title: vancouver on Thinking Through the Party
channel.description: Recent content in vancouver on Thinking Through the Party

item.title: One Year in Vancouver: Visualizing Events
item.description: We’re looking at the year of 2018 in Vancouver through the lens of event listings on the Georgia Straight Events page. I find their list extremely useful and use it all the time to find cool things to do, and notice a great deal of events happening all over the city. I collected all the events over the course of 2018 and wanted to make a “map of the city” from this data.
